reviewText: This movie could be used as background for a gathering of some kind, perhaps a cocktail party.  The images on screen are nice winter scenes and the music is nice Christmas music.  I expected a story plot and there is none in this film.  It's just nice winter scenes shown over music.  Not what I expected.

This is a very beautiful DVD filled with gorgeous images of the Berkshires of Western Massachusetts during Christmas time. Christmas songs play wonderfully in the background as the snow falls. It also has a nice feature where it's on continuous play so it replays over and over. I think this will become a tradition to have this playing in the background during the Christmas season.
